pkgmetadata.longdescription: # lcapy-guiThis package provides an experimental GUI for Lcapy, lcapy-tk.Schematics can be created and saved in a number of formats andsymbolic component voltages and currents can be inspected.From the console it can be run as `lcapy-tk`.From a python interpreter it can be run using: from lcapygui import LcapyTk e = LcapyTk() e.display()
